name: Jane Doe
desc: WiCys presented great opportunities for me to join cybersecurity competitions.  It has really opened doors for me and shown me all about the different paths that cybersecurity could take me.

name: H4Ck3r
desc: Attending BSides through WiCys was a great way to listen to people talk about cybersecurity projects they have been working on and unveil projects that have previously been confidential.  It was my first time attending a cybersecurity conference and it has influenced me to continue looking for similar opportunities in the future.  WiCys also provided an AirBnb for the club to stay at, which was a great way for me to get to know other members in the club.  I definitely felt closer to those members from fostering a relationship there durign teh conference days.

name: Benny Beaver
desc: I participated with WiCys in the National Cyber League and I found it gave me a chance to learn different tools used in the cybersecurity world.  At the beginning, they taught me how to use each tool step by step, then I got to participate in an individual and team competition using the skills that I had learned.  Thank you WiCys for telling me about that competition!

name: CyberForce Champion!
desc: Interacting on the WiCys Discord kept me updated on upcoming security competitions that I was eligible to participate in, like CyberForce.  During the weekend of CyberForce, I was able to talk to people from different National Labs and the opportunities they offer there, if I were to go down the research path.  I really liked playing their Reign 4.0 demo game, which got me using  cryptology and looking up useful Linux commands to progress through each room!

name: Anonymous
desc: I think that WiCys creates a safe space to get introduced to the field of security because I got to make close friends with the members I met during the meetings.  WiCys had a few collaborations with the Security Club (OSUSEC) and I was slowly able to know members from both clubs.  I was also able to feel more confident and comfortable to going club events!
alt: An image of WiCyS Club Activities!
